title: Container shipping instructions and booking confirmations
dataVerified: Shipper, booking party, container details, vessel, sailing schedule
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Booking status (confirmed/loaded/delivered). Link to shipping line/NVOCC system (shipper and carrier, requires authentication)
rationale: Domain binding verifies shipping line/NVOCC. Prevents booking fraud. Container slot allocation verification. Demurrage/detention dispute documentation.
